properties.name: NAGODA - LINTON HILLS
properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...

properties.name: KANDY - HILL VIEW RESIDENCE
properties.description: Spacious four-bedroom family home with panoramic hill views, open-plan kitchen/dining, and a sunlit living room. Close to schools, shops, transport and recreational areas.

properties.name: GALLE - OCEAN BREEZE VILLA
properties.description: Elegant coastal villa with generous living spaces, modern kitchen, and landscaped garden. Short distance to beaches, cafes, and historic Galle Fort.

properties.name: COLOMBO - CITY HEIGHTS APARTMENT
properties.description: Modern two-bedroom apartment with open-plan living, balcony views, and secure parking. Convenient access to business hubs, shopping and transport.

properties.name: MATALE - GREEN MEADOWS
properties.description: Charming three-bedroom home with bright interiors, fitted kitchen, and private garden. Close to schools, markets, bus routes and scenic trails.

properties.name: JAFFNA - PALM COURT RESIDENCE
properties.description: Well-presented four-bedroom residence featuring dual living areas, large kitchen, and shaded courtyard. Easy reach of local shops, schools and transport.
